Topstartup

My kneecaps would be broken...

It's a good thing I'm not in the mafia. If I was, I would be breaking my knee caps right now. I'd ring the buzzer downstairs and let myself in. I'd walk up to my door with the baseball bat behind my back. As soon as I hear the lock click, I'd kick the door in. "Where's my f***ing money?" I'd say to myself.

I've been borrowing from different accounts - peter to pay paul as they say. That's the problem with living in the moment and buying flights, iphones and moving house. I've overspent to the tune of $4,068.26. Ouch! I'd better develop a plan to pay myself back.

It's confessionals like these that may make me lose my standing as the most "fiscally responsible person I know" according to one friend of mine. But luckily they wont read this - it's only on the internet.
